body:
Welcome to my _new blog_ about learning Astro! Here, I will share my learning journey as I build a new website.

## What I've accomplished

1. **Installing Astro**: First, I created a new Astro project and set up my online accounts.

2. **Making Pages**: I then learned how to make pages by creating new `.astro` files and placing them in the `src/pages/` folder.

3. **Making Blog Posts**: This is my first blog post! I now have Astro pages and Markdown posts!

## What's next

I will finish the Astro tutorial, and then keep adding more posts. Watch this space for more to come.

data.title: My First Blog Post
data.description: This is the first post of my new Astro blog.
data.author: Astro Learner

image.alt: The full Astro logo.

body: This post should show up with my other blog posts, because `Astro.glob()` is returning a list of all my posts in order to create my list.

body: After a successful first week learning Astro, I decided to try some more. I wrote and imported a small component from memory!

data.title: My Second Blog Post
data.description: After learning some Astro, I couldn't stop!

body: It wasn't always smooth sailing, but I'm enjoying building with Astro. And, the [Discord community](https://astro.build/chat) is really friendly and helpful!

data.title: My Third Blog Post
data.description: I had some challenges, but asking in the community really helped!
